patient stories about us

  • St. Luke’s Pediatric Specialty
    Center

    The region’s first and only free-standing facility dedicated entirely to caring for kids.

  • Children’s Hospital Association

    St. Luke's is a proud member with access to a national network of institutions committed to improving the quality, safety and cost of pediatric health care.

  • St. Luke’s Primary Care

    Our pediatric practices offer same-day appointments, meet the doctor visits and weekend and evening hours designed to meet your individual needs. New patients always welcome.

Commited to quality healthcare

St. Luke’s is committed to providing high-quality health care to children of all ages. Our board-certified pediatricians and expert advanced practitioners see patients at our primary care pediatric practices located throughout the Lehigh Valley and surrounding areas.


Our physicians and advanced practitioners treat young patients in a manner that is comfortable for the child and comforting for parents. We understand that children are not small adults; their developing bodies may require special medications and different medical treatments.

View our services

Find a doctor near you

Practices are conveniently located in your neighborhood.


The COVID-19 vaccine is now available for children ages 5-11


The vaccine is safe and effective in preventing COVID-19 in children. Need to make an appointment? Visit our Coronavirus Digital Resource Center for more information.
